name: xdg-app-paths
description: Determine (XDG-compatible) paths for storing application files (cache, config, data, etc)

scripts.coverage: run-s --silent +:max-node-8 && shx echo "[coverage] WARN Code coverage skipped [for NodeJS < v10]" 1>&2 || run-s "+:coverage"
scripts.cov:view: run-s cov:html && cd coverage && open-cli index.html
scripts.lint: run-s --silent +:max-node-8 && shx echo "[lint] WARN Lint checks skipped [for NodeJS < v10]" 1>&2 || run-p --print-name "lint:*"
scripts.rebuild:cjs: shx rm -fr build/cjs && tsc -p tsconfig/tsconfig.cjs.json && shx cp -r src/esm-wrapper build/cjs/src && shx mkdir -p build/.targets && shx touch build/.targets/build-cjs.succeeded
scripts.rebuild:esm: shx rm -fr build/esm && tsc -p tsconfig/tsconfig.esm.json && shx cp src/esm-wrapper/package.json build/esm/src && shx mkdir -p build/.targets && shx touch build/.targets/build-esm.succeeded
scripts.rebuild:umd: shx rm -fr build/umd && tsc -p tsconfig/tsconfig.umd.json && shx mkdir -p build/.targets && shx touch build/.targets/build-umd.succeeded
scripts.rebuild:testbed: shx rm -fr build/testbed && tsc -p tsconfig/tsconfig.testbed.json && shx cp -r src/esm-wrapper build/testbed/src && shx mkdir -p build/.targets && shx touch build/.targets/build-tests.succeeded
scripts.rebuild:types: shx rm -fr build/types && tsc -p tsconfig/tsconfig.types.json && shx mkdir -p build/.targets && shx touch build/.targets/build-types.succeeded
scripts.reset:hard: git clean -dfx && git reset --hard && npm install
scripts.test:types: run-s --silent +:max-node-8 && shx echo "[test:types] WARN Type testing skipped [for NodeJS < v10]" 1>&2 || tsd
scripts.update:changelog: run-s --silent _:update:changelog && git diff --quiet --exit-code CHANGELOG.mkd || shx echo "[update] info CHANGELOG updated"
scripts.+:coverage: run-s build test:code && is-ci && run-s cov:send || run-s cov:view
scripts._:exists:git-changelog: node -e "if (!require('command-exists').sync('git-changelog')){process.exit(1);};" || ( shx echo "WARN `git-changelog` missing (try `go get -u github.com/rivy-go/git-changelog/cmd/git-changelog`)" & exit 1 )

scripts._:lint:commits.all:spell: node -e "result=require('child_process').spawnSync('git log --color=never | cspell stdin --no-summary --config ".vscode/cspell.json"',{shell:true,encoding:'utf-8'}); if (result.status != 0) {console.error('[cspell] ERR! Unknown words in commit(s)\n'+result.stdout+'\n'+result.stderr); process.exit(1);} else {console.log(result.stdout);};"
scripts._:lint:commits.new:commitlint: node -e "v=require('./package.json').version; result=require('child_process').spawnSync('commitlint --config .commitlint.config.js --from v'+v,{shell:true,encoding:'utf-8'}); if (result.status != 0) {console.error('[commitlint] ERR! Flawed commit(s) found\n'+result.stdout+'\n'+result.stderr); process.exit(1);} else {console.log(result.stdout);};"
scripts._:lint:commits.new:spell: node -e "v=require('./package.json').version; result=require('child_process').spawnSync('git log v'+v+'.. --color=never | cspell stdin --no-summary --config ".vscode/cspell.json"',{shell:true,encoding:'utf-8'}); if (result.status != 0) {console.error('[cspell] ERR! Unknown words in commit(s)\n'+result.stdout+'\n'+result.stderr); process.exit(1);} else {console.log(result.stdout);};"
scripts._:vcs-clean-err: run-s --silent _:vcs-clean || ( shx echo "[vcs] ERR! Uncommitted changes" 1>&2 & exit 1 )
scripts._:vcs-strictly-clean-err: run-s --silent _:vcs-strictly-clean || ( shx echo "[vcs] ERR! Uncommitted changes and/or untracked files" 1>&2 & exit 1 )
scripts._:v_tag:exists: node -e "v=require('./package.json').version; result=require('child_process').spawnSync('git rev-list refs/tags/v'+v,{shell:true,encoding:'utf-8'}); if (result.status != 0) {console.error('[lint] WARN Missing commit tag v'+v); process.exit(1);}"
scripts._:update:changelog: run-s --silent _:exists:git-changelog && git changelog > CHANGELOG.mkd || shx echo "[update] WARN CHANGELOG not updated" 1>&2
scripts._:update:dist.build: shx rm -fr dist/cjs dist/esm && shx mkdir -p dist/cjs dist/esm && shx cp -r build/cjs/src/* dist/cjs && shx cp -r build/esm/src/* dist/esm
scripts._:update:dist.pack: node -e "delete process.env.NPM_CONFIG_DRY_RUN; name=require('./package.json').name; result=require('child_process').spawnSync('npm pack && shx mkdir -p dist && shx mv '+name+'-*.tgz dist/'+name+'.tgz',{shell:true,encoding:'utf-8'}); if (result.status != 0) {console.error('[update] ERR! Unable to package (into *.tgz) for distribution\n'+result.stdout+'\n'+result.stderr); process.exit(1);} else {console.log(result.stdout);};"
scripts._:update:dist.types: shx mkdir -p dist && shx rm -fr dist/types && rollup --config .rollup.config.types.js && shx mkdir -p dist/cjs && shx cp dist/types/*.cjs.d.ts dist/cjs
scripts._:update:dist:rebuild: shx rm -fr dist && run-s --silent _:update:dist.build _:update:dist.types _:update:dist.normalizeEOL _:update:dist.pack && shx mkdir -p dist/.targets && shx touch dist/.targets/update-dist.succeeded
scripts._:version:spell:changelog_update: run-s --silent _:exists:git-changelog && git changelog -u | cspell stdin --config ".vscode/cspell.json" || shx echo "[lint] WARN CHANGELOG update `cspell` exception" 1>&2
scripts._:version:update:changelog: run-s --silent _:exists:git-changelog && node -e "v=require('./package.json').version; result=require('child_process').spawnSync('git changelog --next-tag-now --next-tag v'+v,{shell:true,encoding:'utf-8'}); if (result.status != 0) {console.error('ERR! '+result.stderr); process.exit(1);} else {require('fs').writeFileSync('CHANGELOG.mkd',result.stdout);};" || shx echo "[version] WARN CHANGELOG not updated" 1>&2
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm run test --test-dist && run-s --silent update _:vcs-strictly-clean-err
scripts.version: run-s --silent _:version:update:changelog && run-s lint:spell && run-s --silent update:dist && git add CHANGELOG.mkd dist

devDependencies:#: * for testing, Node-v6 requires ava < v2 and nyc < v15
